level.title: Text Processing
level.description: Learn to search, filter, and process text using grep, sed, and other tools

exercises.title: Search Text with grep
exercises.description: Use 'grep' to find lines containing 'error' in the file 'log.txt'.

files.name: log.txt
files.content:
Starting process
error: Connection failed
Retrying...
error: Timeout

exercises.title: Case-Insensitive Search
exercises.description: Use 'grep -i' to search for 'ERROR' in log.txt, ignoring case.

files.name: log.txt
files.content:
Error occurred
error: failed
ERROR: Critical

exercises.title: Count Matching Lines
exercises.description: Use 'grep -c' to count how many lines contain 'warning' in log.txt.

files.name: log.txt
files.content:
warning: Low memory
warning: High CPU
Info: Process started

hints: Returns a number instead of lines

exercises.title: Invert Match
exercises.description: Use 'grep -v' to show lines that DON'T contain 'debug' in log.txt.

files.name: log.txt
files.content:
debug: Line 1
Info: Running
debug: Line 2
Warning: Check this

hints: grep -v shows lines that DON'T match

exercises.title: Pipe Output to grep
exercises.description: Use 'ls -l' piped to 'grep' to find all .txt files in the directory.
hints: The pipe | sends output to another command
This shows directory listings filtered for .txt files
